Root Cause: Ping timeout from router to external DNS

Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Observations: The router is experiencing a ping timeout to an external DNS server.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Impact: This issue can cause DNS resolution failures, leading to application errors.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Correlations: This issue may be related to network configuration or DNS server issues.

Explanation.Conclusion: The log message indicates a ping timeout, suggesting network connectivity issues.
